sqls.sql:
select z.rollBarcode, z.boxBarcode, z.trayBarcode, z.producePlanCode, z.salesOrderCode, z.CONSUMERNAME, z.productModel, z.batchcode, z.rollQualityGradeCode, z.rollDeviceCode, z.name, z.rollWeight, z.productWidth, z.productWeight, z.productLength, z.rollOutputTime from (SELECT ht.rollBarcode, br.boxBarcode, tbr.trayBarcode, ht.producePlanCode, ht.salesOrderCode, ht.CONSUMERNAME, ht.productModel, ht.batchcode, ht.rollQualityGradeCode, ht.DeviceCode as rollDeviceCode, ht.name, ht.rollWeight, ht.productWidth, ht.productWeight, ht.productLength, ht.rollOutputTime FROM hs_totalstatistics ht INNER JOIN hs_box_roll br ON ht.rollBarcode = br.rollBarcode INNER JOIN hs_tray_box_roll tbr on br.boxBarcode = tbr.boxBarcode WHERE 1=1 and ht.barcodeType = 'roll' <#if key["start"]??&&key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime between :start and :end </#if> <#if key["start"]??&&!key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime > :start </#if> <#if !key["start"]??&&key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime < :end </#if> <#if !key["start"]??> and 1=2 </#if> <#if key["rollBarcode"]??> and ht.rollBarcode like :rollBarcode </#if> <#if key["boxBarcode"]??> and br.boxBarcode like :boxBarcode </#if> <#if key["trayBarcode"]??> and tbr.trayBarcode like :trayBarcode </#if> <#if key["consumerName"]??> and ht.CONSUMERNAME like :consumerName </#if> <#if key["salesOrderCode"]??> and ht.salesOrderCode = replace(:salesOrderCode,'%','') </#if> <#if key["batchcode"]??> and ht.batchcode = replace(:batchcode,'%','') </#if> <#if key["productModel"]??> and ht.productModel like :productModel </#if> <#if key["rollDeviceCode"]??> and ht.DeviceCode = :rollDeviceCode </#if> <#if key["productWidth"]??> and ht.productWidth = :productWidth </#if> <#if key["productRollLength"]??> and ht.productRollLength = :productRollLength </#if> <#if key["workshop"]??> and ht.name = :workshop </#if>
union ALL SELECT ht.rollBarcode, '' as boxBarcode, tbr.trayBarcode, ht.producePlanCode, ht.salesOrderCode, ht.CONSUMERNAME, ht.productModel, ht.batchcode, ht.rollQualityGradeCode, ht.DeviceCode as rollDeviceCode, ht.name, ht.rollWeight, ht.productWidth, ht.productWeight, ht.productLength, ht.rollOutputTime FROM hs_totalstatistics ht INNER JOIN hs_tray_box_roll tbr on ht.rollBarcode = tbr.rollBarcode WHERE 1=1 and ht.barcodeType = 'roll' <#if key["start"]??&&key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime between :start and :end </#if> <#if key["start"]??&&!key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime > :start </#if> <#if !key["start"]??&&key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime < :end </#if> <#if !key["start"]??> and 1=2 </#if> <#if key["rollBarcode"]??> and ht.rollBarcode like :rollBarcode </#if> <#if key["trayBarcode"]??> and tbr.trayBarcode like :trayBarcode </#if> <#if key["consumerName"]??> and ht.CONSUMERNAME like :consumerName </#if> <#if key["salesOrderCode"]??> and ht.salesOrderCode = replace(:salesOrderCode,'%','') </#if> <#if key["batchcode"]??> and ht.batchcode = replace(:batchcode,'%','') </#if> <#if key["productModel"]??> and ht.productModel like :productModel </#if> <#if key["rollDeviceCode"]??> and ht.DeviceCode = :rollDeviceCode </#if> <#if key["productWidth"]??> and ht.productWidth = :productWidth </#if> <#if key["productRollLength"]??> and ht.productRollLength = :productRollLength </#if> <#if key["workshop"]??> and ht.name = :workshop </#if> ) z ORDER BY z.trayBarcode,z.boxBarcode,z.rollBarcode

select IFNULL(FORMAT(SUM(z.rollWeight),1),0) as totalRollWeight from (SELECT ht.rollBarcode, br.boxBarcode, tbr.trayBarcode, ht.producePlanCode, ht.salesOrderCode, ht.CONSUMERNAME, ht.productModel, ht.batchcode, ht.rollQualityGradeCode, ht.DeviceCode as rollDeviceCode, ht.name, ht.rollWeight, ht.productWidth, ht.productWeight, ht.productLength, ht.rollOutputTime FROM hs_totalstatistics ht INNER JOIN hs_box_roll br ON ht.rollBarcode = br.rollBarcode INNER JOIN hs_tray_box_roll tbr on br.boxBarcode = tbr.boxBarcode WHERE 1=1 and ht.barcodeType = 'roll' <#if key["start"]??&&key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime between :start and :end </#if> <#if key["start"]??&&!key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime > :start </#if> <#if !key["start"]??&&key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime < :end </#if> <#if !key["start"]??> and 1=2 </#if> <#if key["rollBarcode"]??> and ht.rollBarcode like :rollBarcode </#if> <#if key["boxBarcode"]??> and br.boxBarcode like :boxBarcode </#if> <#if key["trayBarcode"]??> and tbr.trayBarcode like :trayBarcode </#if> <#if key["consumerName"]??> and ht.CONSUMERNAME like :consumerName </#if> <#if key["salesOrderCode"]??> and ht.salesOrderCode = replace(:salesOrderCode,'%','') </#if> <#if key["batchcode"]??> and ht.batchcode = replace(:batchcode,'%','') </#if> <#if key["productModel"]??> and ht.productModel like :productModel </#if> <#if key["rollDeviceCode"]??> and ht.DeviceCode = :rollDeviceCode </#if> <#if key["productWidth"]??> and ht.productWidth = :productWidth </#if> <#if key["productRollLength"]??> and ht.productRollLength = :productRollLength </#if> <#if key["workshop"]??> and ht.name = :workshop </#if>
union ALL SELECT ht.rollBarcode, '' as boxBarcode, tbr.trayBarcode, ht.producePlanCode, ht.salesOrderCode, ht.CONSUMERNAME, ht.productModel, ht.batchcode, ht.rollQualityGradeCode, ht.DeviceCode as rollDeviceCode, ht.name, ht.rollWeight, ht.productWidth, ht.productWeight, ht.productLength, ht.rollOutputTime FROM hs_totalstatistics ht INNER JOIN hs_tray_box_roll tbr on ht.rollBarcode = tbr.rollBarcode WHERE 1=1 and ht.barcodeType = 'roll' <#if key["start"]??&&key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime between :start and :end </#if> <#if key["start"]??&&!key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime > :start </#if> <#if !key["start"]??&&key["end"]??> and ht.rollOutputTime < :end </#if> <#if !key["start"]??> and 1=2 </#if> <#if key["rollBarcode"]??> and ht.rollBarcode like :rollBarcode </#if> <#if key["trayBarcode"]??> and tbr.trayBarcode like :trayBarcode </#if> <#if key["consumerName"]??> and ht.CONSUMERNAME like :consumerName </#if> <#if key["salesOrderCode"]??> and ht.salesOrderCode = replace(:salesOrderCode,'%','') </#if> <#if key["batchcode"]??> and ht.batchcode = replace(:batchcode,'%','') </#if> <#if key["productModel"]??> and ht.productModel like :productModel </#if> <#if key["rollDeviceCode"]??> and ht.DeviceCode = :rollDeviceCode </#if> <#if key["productWidth"]??> and ht.productWidth = :productWidth </#if> <#if key["productRollLength"]??> and ht.productRollLength = :productRollLength </#if> <#if key["workshop"]??> and ht.name = :workshop </#if> ) z
